chief executive in a surprising management reshuffling announced with the Internet company's fourth-quarter earnings, which jumped 29%. The Mountain View, Calif., company said the moves, effective April 4, were made to streamline decision-making and create clearer lines of responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. Eric Schmidt will no longer be responsible for the day-to-day operations. Instead, he will become exective chairman, focusing on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships. -- is he retiring from show business, or he is just leaving Live? Joking that he had a drink before he made the announcement, he asked David Letterman what he said. friend of Democratic congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords , has visited the lawmaker in her hospital room and is in close contact with her astronaut husband Mark Kelly, she told NBC's`` Meet The Press.'' Gabrielle Giffords is making progress every day. She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Kirsten Gillibrand said.`` It's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury,'' she added. The 40-year-old Gabrielle Giffords has survived despite being shot through the head
